law.catch_line: Administrative regulations for listing, adoption, and purchase of subject programs.
law.text: The Kentucky Board of Education, upon the recommendation of the chief state school officer, shall have the authority to prescribe administrative regulations for the recommended listing by the State Textbook Commission, adoption by local adoption units, and the purchase of subject programs for the pupils in the public schools.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 419, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 154, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 8, effective March 13, 1974. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 1.
